description: Situated in a corner of the charming little square in Marciana Marina, just a few minutes from Cotone, one of the oldest and most beautiful parts of the town. The restaurant serves Mediterranean dishes and specialities from Elba, all reinterpreted with an individual twist. Raw fish is one of the house specialities.
